string.text:
The SA-58 manufactured by american company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, it's made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. This modelel comes with 21" barrel length, and other "Austrian Style" stuff like original Austrian foregrip for a FAL, aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. This model used by military and Law Enforcement and can run a fully automatic. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: None
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: SR-25 suppressor
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be upgraded using Tactical Kits

The SA-58 manufactured by american company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, it's made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. This modelel comes with 21" barrel length, and other "Austrian Style" stuff like original Austrian foregrip for a FAL, aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. This model used by military and Law Enforcement and can run a fully automatic. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.
 This modification is effective at long and medium distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Trijicon Acog and Aimpoint T1 (integrated)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: SR-25 suppressor

The SA-58 manufactured by american company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, it's made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. This modelel comes with 21" barrel length, and other "Austrian Style" stuff like original Austrian foregrip for a FAL, aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. This model used by military and Law Enforcement and can run a fully automatic. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.
 This modification is effective at long and medium distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: ELCAN SpecterDr and Aimpoint T1 (integrated)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: SR-25 suppressor

The SA-58 manufactured by american company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, it's made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. This modelel comes with 21" barrel length, and other "Austrian Style" stuff like original Austrian foregrip for a FAL, aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. This model used by military and Law Enforcement and can run a fully automatic. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.
 This modification is effective at long and medium distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Leupold Mark 8 and Aimpoint T1 (integrated)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: SR-25 suppressor
"Scout" Tactical kit for SA58 FAL AUS (BaS)

%c[ui_gray_1]The kit converting the gun in to the great marksman rifle. The kit includes: Fab AG FAL pistol grip, dust cover DS Arms Extreme Duty with Picatinny rail, Vltor CASV foregrip for FAL, 21" barrel for SA-58 7.62x51 and DSA BRS stock. Also there is two scopes: Aimpoint T1 on NcStar 45 and Trijicon Acog. This upgrade is irreversible.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] DS Arms SA-58 AUS "Austrian Style".
"Marauder" Tactical kit for SA58 FAL AUS (BaS)

%c[ui_gray_1]The kit converting the gun in to the great marksman rifle. The kit includes: Fab AG FAL pistol grip, dust cover DS Arms Extreme Duty with Picatinny rail, Vltor CASV foregrip for FAL, 21" barrel for SA-58 7.62x51 and DSA BRS stock. Also there is two scopes: Aimpoint T1 on NcStar 45 and Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS. This upgrade is irreversible.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] DS Arms SA-58 AUS "Austrian Style".
"Defender" Tactical kit for SA58 FAL AUS (BaS)

%c[ui_gray_1]The kit converting the gun in to the great marksman rifle. The kit includes: Fab AG FAL pistol grip, dust cover DS Arms Extreme Duty with Picatinny rail, Vltor CASV foregrip for FAL, 21" barrel for SA-58 7.62x51 and DSA BRS stock. Also there is two scopes: Aimpoint T1 on NcStar 45 and ELCAN SpecterDR. This upgrade is irreversible.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] DS Arms SA-58 AUS "Austrian Style".
